articles.title: Takeda receives positive CHMP opinion recommending approval of dengue vaccine candidate in EU and dengue-endemic countries | eHealth Magazine eHealth Magazine - Elets
articles.description: Takeda announced that the Committee for Medicinal Products for Human Use (CHMP) of the European Medicines Agency (EMA) recommended the approval of Takeda's dengue vaccine candidate.
articles.content: Takeda announced that the Committee for Medicinal Products for Human Use (CHMP) of the European Medicines Agency (EMA) recommended the approval of Takeda’s dengue vaccine candidate, TAK-003, for the … [+3326 chars]

articles.title: War sparks child poverty surge in eastern Europe and Russia — UNICEF - Euronews
articles.description: The UN children's fund says almost four million children in the region — three-quarters of them Russian — will go into poverty because of the war and the economic downturn. #EuropeNews
articles.content: The war in Ukraine, and the resulting rise in the cost of living, has plunged millions more children into poverty in Eastern Europe and Central Asia in recent months, warns a study by the United Nati… [+2154 chars]
